page.title: 07RECREATION CRICKET CLUB
page.content: Northop Hall have had a well known cricket team in the North Wales area for many years.Season after season they have done well in both local and national cricket competitions -this year is no exception.The team are just four steps away from a magical trip to Lords in the National Village Knockout.They made short work of neighbours Northop in the Cheshire and Clwyd Zone Final on Sunday July 1st to win by a comfortable seven wickets in a game restricted to 26 overs because of rain.Northop who knocked out mighty Marchwiel in the semi-finals, never got going and were out with only 55 runs on the scoreboard.Despite a couple of scares Hall's experienced side saw their way through to victory for the loss of 3 wickets for a place in the last 32.
